scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; tsd update --save --overwrite
scripts.build: npm run build-rm; npm run build-purs; npm run build-ts; npm run build-coffee; npm run concat
scripts.build-ts: node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --target ES5 --noEmitOnError --noImplicitAny --rootDir ./src/ --outdir output --declaration --module commonjs src/ts/*.ts;
scripts.espower: for i in `find output/test -name test*.js`; do node node_modules/espower-cli/bin/cmd.js $i > $i.esp.js; done
scripts.report: node node_modules/plato/bin/plato --title duxca.lib.js --jshint .jshintrc --recurse --dir report --exclude output/test/ output; open http://localhost:8000/report/
scripts.stop: killall -- Python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000; killall -- node node_modules/peer/bin/peerjs --port 9000 --debug; exit 0
